00026 template <typename MODULE,
00027           unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00028           typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
00029 class simple_target_socket :
00030   public tlm::tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES>
00031 {
00032   friend class fw_process;
00033   friend class bw_process;
00034 public:
00035   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type              transaction_type;
00036   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_phase_type                phase_type;
00037   typedef tlm::tlm_sync_enum                            sync_enum_type;
00038   typedef tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>               fw_interface_type;
00039   typedef tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>               bw_interface_type;
00040   typedef tlm::tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES>       base_type;
00041 
00042 public:
00043   explicit simple_target_socket(const char* n = "simple_target_socket") :
00044     base_type(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name(n)),
00045     m_fw_process(this),
00046     m_bw_process(this)
00047   {
00048     bind(m_fw_process);
00049   }
00050 
00051   // bw transport must come thru us.
00052   tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES> * operator ->() {return &m_bw_process;}
00053 
00054   // REGISTER_XXX
00055   void register_nb_transport_fw(MODULE* mod,
00056                                 sync_enum_type (MODULE::*cb)(transaction_type&,
00057                                                              phase_type&,
00058                                                              sc_core::sc_time&))
00059   {
00060     assert(!sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->elaboration_done());
00061     m_fw_process.set_nb_transport_ptr(mod, cb);
00062   }
00063 
00064   void register_b_transport(MODULE* mod,
00065                             void (MODULE::*cb)(transaction_type&,
00066                                                sc_core::sc_time&))
00067   {
00068     assert(!sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->elaboration_done());
00069     m_fw_process.set_b_transport_ptr(mod, cb);
00070   }
00071 
00072   void register_transport_dbg(MODULE* mod,
00073                               unsigned int (MODULE::*cb)(transaction_type&))
00074   {
00075     assert(!sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->elaboration_done());
00076     m_fw_process.set_transport_dbg_ptr(mod, cb);
00077   }
00078 
00079   void register_get_direct_mem_ptr(MODULE* mod,
00080                                    bool (MODULE::*cb)(transaction_type&,
00081                                                       tlm::tlm_dmi&))
00082   {
00083     assert(!sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->elaboration_done());
00084     m_fw_process.set_get_direct_mem_ptr(mod, cb);
00085   }

00087 private:
00088   //make call on bw path.
00089   sync_enum_type bw_nb_transport(transaction_type &trans, phase_type &phase, sc_core::sc_time &t)
00090   {
00091     return base_type::operator ->()->nb_transport_bw(trans, phase, t);
00092   }
00093 
00094   void bw_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(sc_dt::uint64 s,sc_dt::uint64 e)

00098 
00099   //Helper class to handle bw path calls
00100   // Needed to detect transaction end when called from b_transport.
00101   class bw_process : public tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>
00102   {
00103   public:
00104     bw_process(simple_target_socket *p_own) : m_owner(p_own)
00105     {
00106     }
00107 
00108     sync_enum_type nb_transport_bw(transaction_type &trans, phase_type &phase, sc_core::sc_time &t)
00109     {
00110       typename std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *>::iterator it;
00111       
00112       it = m_owner->m_pending_trans.find(&trans);
00113       if(it == m_owner->m_pending_trans.end()) {
00114         // Not a blocking call, forward.
00115         return m_owner->bw_nb_transport(trans, phase, t);
00116 
00117       } else {
00118         if (phase == tlm::END_REQ) {
00119           m_owner->m_end_request.notify(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME);
00120           return tlm::TLM_ACCEPTED;
00121         
00122         } else if (phase == tlm::BEGIN_RESP) {
00123           if (m_owner->m_current_transaction == &trans) {
00124             m_owner->m_end_request.notify(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME);
00125           }
00126           //TODO: add response-accept delay?
00127           it->second->notify(t);
00128           m_owner->m_pending_trans.erase(it);
00129           return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;
00130 
00131         } else {
00132           assert(0); exit(1);
00133         }
00134 
00135 //        return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;  //Should not reach here
00136       }
00137     }
00138 
00139     void invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(sc_dt::uint64 s,sc_dt::uint64 e)
00140     {
00141       return m_owner->bw_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(s, e);
00142     }
00143 
00144   private:
00145     simple_target_socket *m_owner;
00146   };
00147 
00148   class fw_process : public tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00149                     public tlm::tlm_mm_interface
00150   {
00151   public:
00152     typedef sync_enum_type (MODULE::*NBTransportPtr)(transaction_type&,
00153                                                      tlm::tlm_phase&,
00154                                                      sc_core::sc_time&);
00155     typedef void (MODULE::*BTransportPtr)(transaction_type&,
00156                                           sc_core::sc_time&);
00157     typedef unsigned int (MODULE::*TransportDbgPtr)(transaction_type&);
00158     typedef bool (MODULE::*GetDirectMemPtr)(transaction_type&,
00159                                             tlm::tlm_dmi&);
00160       
00161     fw_process(simple_target_socket *p_own) :
00162       m_name(p_own->name()),
00163       m_owner(p_own),
00164       m_mod(0),
00165       m_nb_transport_ptr(0),
00166       m_b_transport_ptr(0),
00167       m_transport_dbg_ptr(0),
00168       m_get_direct_mem_ptr(0),
00169       m_peq(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("m_peq")),
00170       m_response_in_progress(false)
00171     {
00172       sc_core::sc_spawn_options opts;
00173       opts.set_sensitivity(&m_peq.get_event());
00174       sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&fw_process::b2nb_thread, this), 
00175                         sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("b2nb_thread"), &opts);
00176     }
00177   
00178     void set_nb_transport_ptr(MODULE* mod, NBTransportPtr p)
00179     {
00180       if (m_nb_transport_ptr) {
00181         std::cerr << m_name << ": non-blocking callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00182 
00183       } else {
00184         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00185         m_mod = mod;
00186         m_nb_transport_ptr = p;
00187       }
00188     }
00189 
00190     void set_b_transport_ptr(MODULE* mod, BTransportPtr p)
00191     {
00192       if (m_b_transport_ptr) {
00193         std::cerr << m_name << ": non-blocking callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00194 
00195       } else {
00196         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00197         m_mod = mod;
00198         m_b_transport_ptr = p;
00199       }
00200     }
00201 
00202     void set_transport_dbg_ptr(MODULE* mod, TransportDbgPtr p)
00203     {
00204       if (m_transport_dbg_ptr) {
00205         std::cerr << m_name << ": debug callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00206 
00207       } else {
00208         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00209         m_mod = mod;
00210         m_transport_dbg_ptr = p;
00211       }
00212     }
00213 
00214     void set_get_direct_mem_ptr(MODULE* mod, GetDirectMemPtr p)
00215     {
00216       if (m_get_direct_mem_ptr) {
00217         std::cerr << m_name << ": get DMI pointer callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00218 
00219       } else {
00220         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00221         m_mod = mod;
00222         m_get_direct_mem_ptr = p;
00223       }
00224     }
00225 // Interface implementation
00226     sync_enum_type nb_transport_fw(transaction_type& trans,
00227                                    phase_type& phase,
00228                                    sc_core::sc_time& t)
00229     {
00230       if (m_nb_transport_ptr) {
00231         // forward call
00232         assert(m_mod);
00233         return (m_mod->*m_nb_transport_ptr)(trans, phase, t);
00234 
00235       } else if (m_b_transport_ptr) {
00236         if (phase == tlm::BEGIN_REQ) {
00237           // create thread to do blocking call
00238           sc_core::sc_spawn_options opts;
00239           opts.dont_initialize();
00240           sc_core::sc_event *e = new sc_core::sc_event;
00241           opts.set_sensitivity(e);
00242           sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&fw_process::nb2b_thread, this, sc_ref(trans), e), 
00243                             sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("nb2b_thread"), &opts);
00244           e->notify(t);
00245           return tlm::TLM_ACCEPTED;
00246 
00247         } else if (phase == tlm::END_RESP) {
00248           m_response_in_progress = false;
00249           m_end_response.notify(t);
00250           return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;
00251 
00252         } else {
00253           assert(0); exit(1);
00254 //          return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;   ///< unreachable code
00255         }
00256 
00257       } else {
00258         std::cerr << m_name << ": no transport callback registered" << std::endl;
00259         assert(0); exit(1);
00260 //        return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;   ///< unreachable code
00261       }
00262     }
00263 
00264     void b_transport(transaction_type& trans, sc_core::sc_time& t)
00265     {
00266       if (m_b_transport_ptr) {
00267         // forward call
00268         assert(m_mod);
00269         (m_mod->*m_b_transport_ptr)(trans, t);
00270         return;
00271       
00272       } else if (m_nb_transport_ptr) {
00273         m_peq.notify(trans, t);
00274         t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00275 
00276         mm_end_event_ext mm_ext;
00277         const bool mm_added = !trans.has_mm();
00278 
00279         if (mm_added) {
00280           trans.set_mm(this);
00281           trans.set_auto_extension(&mm_ext);
00282           trans.acquire();
00283         }
00284 
00285         // wait until transaction is finished
00286         sc_core::sc_event end_event;
00287         m_owner->m_pending_trans[&trans] = &end_event;
00288         sc_core::wait(end_event);
00289 
00290         if (mm_added) {
00291           // release will not delete the transaction, it will notify mm_ext.done
00292           trans.release();
00293           if (trans.get_ref_count()) {
00294             sc_core::wait(mm_ext.done);
00295           }
00296           trans.set_mm(0);
00297         }
00298 
00299       } else {
00300         std::cerr << m_name << ": no transport callback registered" << std::endl;
00301         assert(0); exit(1);
00302 //        return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;   ///< unreachable code
00303       }
00304     }
00305 
00306     unsigned int transport_dbg(transaction_type& trans)
00307     {
00308       if (m_transport_dbg_ptr) {
00309         // forward call
00310         assert(m_mod);
00311         return (m_mod->*m_transport_dbg_ptr)(trans);
00312 
00313       } else {
00314         // No debug support
00315         return 0;
00316       }
00317     }
00318 
00319     bool get_direct_mem_ptr(transaction_type& trans,
00320                             tlm::tlm_dmi&  dmi_data)
00321     {
00322       if (m_get_direct_mem_ptr) {
00323         // forward call
00324         assert(m_mod);
00325         return (m_mod->*m_get_direct_mem_ptr)(trans, dmi_data);
00326 
00327       } else {
00328         // No DMI support
00329         dmi_data.allow_read_write();
00330         dmi_data.set_start_address(0x0);
00331         dmi_data.set_end_address((sc_dt::uint64)-1);
00332         return false;
00333       }
00334     }
00335 
00336   private:
00337     void nb2b_thread(transaction_type& trans, sc_core::sc_event* e)
00338     {
00339       sc_core::sc_time t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00340 
00341       // forward call
00342       assert(m_mod);
00343       (m_mod->*m_b_transport_ptr)(trans, t);
00344 
00345       sc_core::wait(t);
00346 
00347       // return path
00348       while (m_response_in_progress) {
00349         sc_core::wait(m_end_response);
00350       }
00351       t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00352       phase_type phase = tlm::BEGIN_RESP;
00353       if (m_owner->bw_nb_transport(trans, phase, t) != tlm::TLM_COMPLETED) {
00354         m_response_in_progress = true;
00355       }
00356 
00357       // cleanup
00358       delete e;
00359     }
00360 
00361     void b2nb_thread()
00362     {
00363       while (true) {
00364         sc_core::wait(m_peq.get_event());
00365 
00366         transaction_type* trans;
00367         while ((trans = m_peq.get_next_transaction())!=0) {
00368           assert(m_mod);
00369           assert(m_nb_transport_ptr);
00370           phase_type phase = tlm::BEGIN_REQ;
00371           sc_core::sc_time t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00372 
00373           switch ((m_mod->*m_nb_transport_ptr)(*trans, phase, t)) {
00374           case tlm::TLM_COMPLETED:
00375           {
00376             // notify transaction is finished
00377             typename std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *>::iterator it =
00378               m_owner->m_pending_trans.find(trans);
00379             assert(it != m_owner->m_pending_trans.end());
00380             it->second->notify(t);
00381             m_owner->m_pending_trans.erase(it);
00382             break;
00383           }
00384 
00385           case tlm::TLM_ACCEPTED:
00386           case tlm::TLM_UPDATED:
00387             switch (phase) {
00388             case tlm::BEGIN_REQ:
00389               m_owner->m_current_transaction = trans;
00390               sc_core::wait(m_owner->m_end_request);
00391               m_owner->m_current_transaction = 0;
00392               break;
00393 
00394             case tlm::END_REQ:
00395               sc_core::wait(t);
00396               break;
00397 
00398             case tlm::BEGIN_RESP:
00399             {
00400               phase = tlm::END_RESP;
00401               t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00402               (m_mod->*m_nb_transport_ptr)(*trans, phase, t);
00403           
00404               // notify transaction is finished
00405               typename std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *>::iterator it =
00406                 m_owner->m_pending_trans.find(trans);
00407               assert(it != m_owner->m_pending_trans.end());
00408               it->second->notify(t);
00409               m_owner->m_pending_trans.erase(it);
00410               break;
00411             }
00412 
00413             default:
00414               assert(0); exit(1);
00415             };
00416             break;
00417 
00418           default:
00419             assert(0); exit(1);
00420           };
00421         }
00422       }
00423     }
00424 
00425     void free(tlm::tlm_generic_payload* trans)
00426     {
00427       mm_end_event_ext* ext = trans->template get_extension<mm_end_event_ext>();
00428       assert(ext);
00429       // notif event first before freeing extensions (reset)
00430       ext->done.notify();
00431       trans->reset();
00432     }
00433 
00434   private:
00435     struct mm_end_event_ext : public tlm::tlm_extension<mm_end_event_ext>
00436     {
00437       tlm::tlm_extension_base* clone() const { return NULL; }
00438       void free() {}
00439       void copy_from(tlm::tlm_extension_base const &) {}
00440       sc_core::sc_event done;
00441     };
00442 
00443   private:
00444     const std::string m_name;
00445     simple_target_socket *m_owner;
00446     MODULE* m_mod;
00447     NBTransportPtr m_nb_transport_ptr;
00448     BTransportPtr m_b_transport_ptr;
00449     TransportDbgPtr m_transport_dbg_ptr;
00450     GetDirectMemPtr m_get_direct_mem_ptr;
00451     peq_with_get<transaction_type> m_peq;
00452     bool m_response_in_progress;
00453     sc_core::sc_event m_end_response;
00454   };
00455 
00456 private:
00457   fw_process m_fw_process;
00458   bw_process m_bw_process;
00459   std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *> m_pending_trans;
00460   sc_core::sc_event m_end_request;
00461   transaction_type* m_current_transaction;
00462 };

00465 template <typename MODULE,
00466           unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00467           typename TYPES = tlm::tlm_base_protocol_types>
00468 class simple_target_socket_tagged :
00469   public tlm::tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES>
00470 {
00471   friend class fw_process;
00472   friend class bw_process;
00473 public:
00474   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_payload_type              transaction_type;
00475   typedef typename TYPES::tlm_phase_type                phase_type;
00476   typedef tlm::tlm_sync_enum                            sync_enum_type;
00477   typedef tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>               fw_interface_type;
00478   typedef tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>               bw_interface_type;
00479   typedef tlm::tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH, TYPES>       base_type;
00480 
00481 public:
00482   explicit simple_target_socket_tagged(const char* n = "simple_target_socket_tagged") :
00483     base_type(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name(n)),
00484     m_fw_process(this),
00485     m_bw_process(this)
00486   {
00487     bind(m_fw_process);
00488   }
00489 
00490   // bw transport must come thru us.
00491   tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES> * operator ->() {return &m_bw_process;}

00493   // REGISTER_XXX
00494   void register_nb_transport_fw(MODULE* mod,
00495                                 sync_enum_type (MODULE::*cb)(int id,
00496                                                              transaction_type&,
00497                                                              phase_type&,
00498                                                              sc_core::sc_time&),
00499                                 int id)
00500   {
00501     assert(!sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->elaboration_done());
00502     m_fw_process.set_nb_transport_ptr(mod, cb);
00503     m_fw_process.set_nb_transport_user_id(id);
00504   }
00505 
00506   void register_b_transport(MODULE* mod,
00507                             void (MODULE::*cb)(int id,
00508                                                transaction_type&,
00509                                                sc_core::sc_time&),
00510                             int id)
00511   {
00512     assert(!sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->elaboration_done());
00513     m_fw_process.set_b_transport_ptr(mod, cb);
00514     m_fw_process.set_b_transport_user_id(id);

00518                               unsigned int (MODULE::*cb)(int id,
00519                                                          transaction_type&),
00520                               int id)
00521   {
00522     assert(!sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->elaboration_done());
00523     m_fw_process.set_transport_dbg_ptr(mod, cb);

00550   //Helper class to handle bw path calls
00551   // Needed to detect transaction end when called from b_transport.
00552   class bw_process : public tlm::tlm_bw_transport_if<TYPES>
00553   {
00554   public:
00555     bw_process(simple_target_socket_tagged *p_own) : m_owner(p_own)
00556     {
00557     }
00558 
00559     sync_enum_type nb_transport_bw(transaction_type &trans, phase_type &phase, sc_core::sc_time &t)
00560     {
00561       typename std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *>::iterator it;
00562       
00563       it = m_owner->m_pending_trans.find(&trans);
00564       if(it == m_owner->m_pending_trans.end()) {
00565         // Not a blocking call, forward.
00566         return m_owner->bw_nb_transport(trans, phase, t);
00567 
00568       } else {
00569         if (phase == tlm::END_REQ) {
00570           m_owner->m_end_request.notify(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME);
00571           return tlm::TLM_ACCEPTED;
00572         
00573         } else if (phase == tlm::BEGIN_RESP) {
00574           if (m_owner->m_current_transaction == &trans) {
00575             m_owner->m_end_request.notify(sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME);
00576           }
00577           //TODO: add response-accept delay?
00578           it->second->notify(t);
00579           m_owner->m_pending_trans.erase(it);
00580           return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;
00581 
00582         } else {
00583           assert(0); exit(1);
00584         }
00585 
00586 //        return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;  //Should not reach here
00587       }
00588     }
00589 
00590     void invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(sc_dt::uint64 s,sc_dt::uint64 e)
00591     {
00592       return m_owner->bw_invalidate_direct_mem_ptr(s, e);
00593     }
00594 
00595   private:
00596     simple_target_socket_tagged *m_owner;
00597   };
00598 
00599   class fw_process : public tlm::tlm_fw_transport_if<TYPES>,
00600                      public tlm::tlm_mm_interface
00601   {
00602   public:
00603     typedef sync_enum_type (MODULE::*NBTransportPtr)(int id, 
00604                                                      transaction_type&,
00605                                                      tlm::tlm_phase&,
00606                                                      sc_core::sc_time&);
00607     typedef void (MODULE::*BTransportPtr)(int id, 
00608                                           transaction_type&,
00609                                           sc_core::sc_time&);
00610     typedef unsigned int (MODULE::*TransportDbgPtr)(int id, 
00611                                                     transaction_type&);
00612     typedef bool (MODULE::*GetDirectMemPtr)(int id, 
00613                                             transaction_type&,
00614                                             tlm::tlm_dmi&);
00615       
00616     fw_process(simple_target_socket_tagged *p_own) :
00617       m_name(p_own->name()),
00618       m_owner(p_own),
00619       m_mod(0),
00620       m_nb_transport_ptr(0),
00621       m_b_transport_ptr(0),
00622       m_transport_dbg_ptr(0),
00623       m_get_direct_mem_ptr(0),
00624       m_nb_transport_user_id(0),
00625       m_b_transport_user_id(0),
00626       m_transport_dbg_user_id(0),
00627       m_get_dmi_user_id(0),
00628       m_peq(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("m_peq")),
00629       m_response_in_progress(false)
00630     {
00631       sc_core::sc_spawn_options opts;
00632       opts.set_sensitivity(&m_peq.get_event());
00633       sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&fw_process::b2nb_thread, this), 
00634                         sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("b2nb_thread"), &opts);
00635     }
00636   
00637     void set_nb_transport_user_id(int id) { m_nb_transport_user_id = id; }
00638     void set_b_transport_user_id(int id) { m_b_transport_user_id = id; }
00639     void set_transport_dbg_user_id(int id) { m_transport_dbg_user_id = id; }
00640     void set_get_dmi_user_id(int id) { m_get_dmi_user_id = id; }
00641 
00642     void set_nb_transport_ptr(MODULE* mod, NBTransportPtr p)
00643     {
00644       if (m_nb_transport_ptr) {
00645         std::cerr << m_name << ": non-blocking callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00646 
00647       } else {
00648         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00649         m_mod = mod;
00650         m_nb_transport_ptr = p;
00651       }
00652     }
00653 
00654     void set_b_transport_ptr(MODULE* mod, BTransportPtr p)
00655     {
00656       if (m_b_transport_ptr) {
00657         std::cerr << m_name << ": non-blocking callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00658 
00659       } else {
00660         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00661         m_mod = mod;
00662         m_b_transport_ptr = p;
00663       }
00664     }
00665 
00666     void set_transport_dbg_ptr(MODULE* mod, TransportDbgPtr p)
00667     {
00668       if (m_transport_dbg_ptr) {
00669         std::cerr << m_name << ": debug callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00670 
00671       } else {
00672         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00673         m_mod = mod;
00674         m_transport_dbg_ptr = p;
00675       }
00676     }
00677 
00678     void set_get_direct_mem_ptr(MODULE* mod, GetDirectMemPtr p)
00679     {
00680       if (m_get_direct_mem_ptr) {
00681         std::cerr << m_name << ": get DMI pointer callback allready registered" << std::endl;
00682 
00683       } else {
00684         assert(!m_mod || m_mod == mod);
00685         m_mod = mod;
00686         m_get_direct_mem_ptr = p;
00687       }
00688     }
00689 // Interface implementation
00690     sync_enum_type nb_transport_fw(transaction_type& trans,
00691                                    phase_type& phase,
00692                                    sc_core::sc_time& t)
00693     {
00694       if (m_nb_transport_ptr) {
00695         // forward call
00696         assert(m_mod);
00697         return (m_mod->*m_nb_transport_ptr)(m_nb_transport_user_id, trans, phase, t);
00698 
00699       } else if (m_b_transport_ptr) {
00700         if (phase == tlm::BEGIN_REQ) {
00701           // create thread to do blocking call
00702           sc_core::sc_spawn_options opts;
00703           opts.dont_initialize();
00704           sc_core::sc_event *e = new sc_core::sc_event;
00705           opts.set_sensitivity(e);
00706           sc_core::sc_spawn(sc_bind(&fw_process::nb2b_thread, this, sc_ref(trans), e), 
00707                             sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("nb2b_thread"), &opts);
00708           e->notify(t);
00709           return tlm::TLM_ACCEPTED;
00710 
00711         } else if (phase == tlm::END_RESP) {
00712           m_response_in_progress = false;
00713           m_end_response.notify(t);
00714           return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;
00715 
00716         } else {
00717           assert(0); exit(1);
00718 //          return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;   ///< unreachable code
00719         }
00720 
00721       } else {
00722         std::cerr << m_name << ": no transport callback registered" << std::endl;
00723         assert(0); exit(1);
00724 //        return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;   ///< unreachable code
00725       }
00726     }
00727 
00728     void b_transport(transaction_type& trans, sc_core::sc_time& t)
00729     {
00730       if (m_b_transport_ptr) {
00731         // forward call
00732         assert(m_mod);
00733         (m_mod->*m_b_transport_ptr)(m_b_transport_user_id, trans, t);
00734         return;
00735       
00736       } else if (m_nb_transport_ptr) {
00737         m_peq.notify(trans, t);
00738         t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00739 
00740         mm_end_event_ext mm_ext;
00741         const bool mm_added = !trans.has_mm();
00742 
00743         if (mm_added){
00744           trans.set_mm(this);
00745           trans.set_auto_extension(&mm_ext);
00746           trans.acquire();
00747         }
00748 
00749         // wait until transaction is finished
00750         sc_core::sc_event end_event;
00751         m_owner->m_pending_trans[&trans] = &end_event;
00752         sc_core::wait(end_event);
00753 
00754         if (mm_added) {
00755           // release will not delete the transaction, it will notify mm_ext.done
00756           trans.release();
00757           if (trans.get_ref_count()) {
00758             sc_core::wait(mm_ext.done);
00759           }
00760           trans.set_mm(0);
00761         }
00762 
00763       } else {
00764         std::cerr << m_name << ": no transport callback registered" << std::endl;
00765         assert(0); exit(1);
00766 //        return tlm::TLM_COMPLETED;   ///< unreachable code
00767       }
00768     }
00769 
00770     unsigned int transport_dbg(transaction_type& trans)
00771     {
00772       if (m_transport_dbg_ptr) {
00773         // forward call
00774         assert(m_mod);
00775         return (m_mod->*m_transport_dbg_ptr)(m_transport_dbg_user_id, trans);
00776 
00777       } else {
00778         // No debug support
00779         return 0;
00780       }
00781     }
00782 
00783     bool get_direct_mem_ptr(transaction_type& trans,
00784                             tlm::tlm_dmi&  dmi_data)
00785     {
00786       if (m_get_direct_mem_ptr) {
00787         // forward call
00788         assert(m_mod);
00789         return (m_mod->*m_get_direct_mem_ptr)(m_get_dmi_user_id, trans, dmi_data);
00790 
00791       } else {
00792         // No DMI support
00793         dmi_data.allow_read_write();
00794         dmi_data.set_start_address(0x0);
00795         dmi_data.set_end_address((sc_dt::uint64)-1);
00796         return false;
00797       }
00798     }
00799 
00800   private:
00801     void nb2b_thread(transaction_type& trans, sc_core::sc_event* e)
00802     {
00803       sc_core::sc_time t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00804 
00805       // forward call
00806       assert(m_mod);
00807       (m_mod->*m_b_transport_ptr)(m_b_transport_user_id, trans, t);
00808 
00809       sc_core::wait(t);
00810 
00811       // return path
00812       while (m_response_in_progress) {
00813         sc_core::wait(m_end_response);
00814       }
00815       t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00816       phase_type phase = tlm::BEGIN_RESP;
00817       if (m_owner->bw_nb_transport(trans, phase, t) != tlm::TLM_COMPLETED) {
00818         m_response_in_progress = true;
00819       }
00820 
00821       // cleanup
00822       delete e;
00823     }
00824 
00825     void b2nb_thread()
00826     {
00827       while (true) {
00828         sc_core::wait(m_peq.get_event());
00829 
00830         transaction_type* trans;
00831         while ((trans = m_peq.get_next_transaction())!=0) {
00832           assert(m_mod);
00833           assert(m_nb_transport_ptr);
00834           phase_type phase = tlm::BEGIN_REQ;
00835           sc_core::sc_time t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00836 
00837           switch ((m_mod->*m_nb_transport_ptr)(m_nb_transport_user_id, *trans, phase, t)) {
00838           case tlm::TLM_COMPLETED:
00839           {
00840             // notify transaction is finished
00841             typename std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *>::iterator it =
00842               m_owner->m_pending_trans.find(trans);
00843             assert(it != m_owner->m_pending_trans.end());
00844             it->second->notify(t);
00845             m_owner->m_pending_trans.erase(it);
00846             break;
00847           }
00848 
00849           case tlm::TLM_ACCEPTED:
00850           case tlm::TLM_UPDATED:
00851             switch (phase) {
00852             case tlm::BEGIN_REQ:
00853               m_owner->m_current_transaction = trans;
00854               sc_core::wait(m_owner->m_end_request);
00855               m_owner->m_current_transaction = 0;
00856               break;
00857 
00858             case tlm::END_REQ:
00859               sc_core::wait(t);
00860               break;
00861 
00862             case tlm::BEGIN_RESP:
00863             {
00864               phase = tlm::END_RESP;
00865               t = sc_core::SC_ZERO_TIME;
00866               (m_mod->*m_nb_transport_ptr)(m_nb_transport_user_id, *trans, phase, t);
00867           
00868               // notify transaction is finished
00869               typename std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *>::iterator it =
00870                 m_owner->m_pending_trans.find(trans);
00871               assert(it != m_owner->m_pending_trans.end());
00872               it->second->notify(t);
00873               m_owner->m_pending_trans.erase(it);
00874               break;
00875             }
00876 
00877             default:
00878               assert(0); exit(1);
00879             };
00880             break;
00881 
00882           default:
00883             assert(0); exit(1);
00884           };
00885         }
00886       }
00887     }
00888 
00889     void free(tlm::tlm_generic_payload* trans)
00890     {
00891       mm_end_event_ext* ext = trans->template get_extension<mm_end_event_ext>();
00892       assert(ext);
00893       // notif event first before freeing extensions (reset)
00894       ext->done.notify();
00895       trans->reset();
00896     }
00897 
00898   private:
00899     struct mm_end_event_ext : public tlm::tlm_extension<mm_end_event_ext>
00900     {
00901       tlm::tlm_extension_base* clone() const { return NULL; }
00902       void free() {}
00903       void copy_from(tlm::tlm_extension_base const &) {}
00904       sc_core::sc_event done;
00905     };
00906 
00907   private:
00908     const std::string m_name;
00909     simple_target_socket_tagged *m_owner;
00910     MODULE* m_mod;
00911     NBTransportPtr m_nb_transport_ptr;
00912     BTransportPtr m_b_transport_ptr;
00913     TransportDbgPtr m_transport_dbg_ptr;
00914     GetDirectMemPtr m_get_direct_mem_ptr;
00915     int m_nb_transport_user_id;
00916     int m_b_transport_user_id;
00917     int m_transport_dbg_user_id;
00918     int m_get_dmi_user_id;
00919     peq_with_get<transaction_type> m_peq;
00920     bool m_response_in_progress;
00921     sc_core::sc_event m_end_response;
00922   };
00923 
00924 private:
00925   fw_process m_fw_process;
00926   bw_process m_bw_process;
00927   std::map<transaction_type*, sc_core::sc_event *> m_pending_trans;
00928   sc_core::sc_event m_end_request;
00929   transaction_type* m_current_transaction;
00930 };
00931 
00932 }
